price: 11. Isu kaanna daa Aniga iyo kuwa beeniya (Aayadaheyga) ee nicmeysan, una sug in xoogaa ah.
arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wadharnī wal-mukadhibīna ulī al-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalīlan
